R

Request - Class in de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.structures
Represents a HTTP request as received from a client
Request(InputStream) - Constructor for class de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.structures.Request
Reads from an input stream and parses the data as a http request
RequestException - Exception in de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.errors
Thrown when there is an error parsing a HTTP request such as The method requested is unknown or unsupported
RequestException(String) - Constructor for exception de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.errors.RequestException
 
RequestHandler - Interface in de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.handlers
Interface for RequestHandlers
RequestHandler need to return a complete response
Response - Class in de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.structures
Represents a HTTP response that can be send to a client
Every response has the date and server headers set automatically.
Response() - Constructor for class de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.structures.Response
Creates an empty response without status code or version
Sets date header and server header (default "deadSimpleHTTP")
Response(byte[]) - Constructor for class de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.structures.Response
Creates a response with status code 200 OK and includes the body
Response(String) - Constructor for class de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.structures.Response
Creates a response with status code 200 OK and includes the body
Response(String, String) - Constructor for class de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.structures.Response
Creates a response
Response(String, String, float) - Constructor for class de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.structures.Response
Creates a response
run() - Method in class de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.handlers.IncomingHandler
 
run() - Method in class de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.server.HTTPServer
This method is required to be public, but should never be called directly.
run() - Method in class de.deadmist.deadSimpleHttp.server.HTTPSServer
This method is required to be public, but should never be called directly.
